ai-vv21:1.1_0: “Your paid homage at the feet of the eggshell,
ai-vv21:1.3_0: from the home life to homelessness out of compassion,
ai-vv21:2.2_0: in the perfected one, the poised;
ai-vv21:2.3_0: quickly venerate him with joined palms:
ai-vv21:2.4_0: and little of my life is left.”
ai-vv21:5.2_0: I meditate alone in the wilderness,
ai-vv21:5.3_0: he went to the crown of death,

ai-vv21:6.3_0: Aṅga and Magadha made of urgency,
ai-vv21:6.4_0: Let your pay respect to me.”

ai-vv21:8.2_0: the company of the fierce and the outcastes.

ai-vv21:11.1_0: That is what the fierce do.

ai-vv21:12.1_0: This is the fourth kind of conceit.
